events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department specifically for the backend developer role based on your experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application. They will be your point of contact throughout the recruitment process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the feedback is promising for the technical round.
Thank you for your availability. We have noted your preferred time slots for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC. Please check your email for the meeting link and details.
The technical interview was completed today. The interviewers had positive remarks about your problem-solving approach and coding skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 10 AM UTC. This session will cover company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview, and feedback is positive regarding your alignment with company values and expectations.
Following the successful interviews, we have sent you an offer outlining the position details, salary, and benefits package.
We have received your feedback on the offer and are glad to hear that the terms are agreeable to you.
You have accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and will proceed with the onboarding steps shortly.
Your onboarding process has started. Please complete the necessary documentation and prepare for your first day next week.
The hiring process has been successfully completed. Welcome to the team, and we look forward to your contributions.
